entry.title: Introduction to React JS
entry.summary: React JS is one of the most popular UI library used in many projects. In this article. we’ll learn: What is React JS Features of React JS What problems React JS solves Introduction React is a Javascript library used to build UI. Features of React JS Declarative Approach Component Based Write Once, Use Anywhere
